title: Liverpool and Chelsea hunt Cagliari’s Italy U-20 midfielder Nicolo Barella
text:
Comments LIVERPOOL and Chelsea are monitoring Cagliari midfielder Nicolo Barella. 
Reds boss Jurgen Klopp sent spies to see the Italy Under-20 star outshine Fiorentina’s Spanish international Borja Valero in Cagliari’s 1-0 defeat in Florence on Sunday. Getty Images Nicolo Barella has been a consistent performer as Cagliari take on bigger clubs in Serie A 
And Sardinian newspaper La Nuova believe Barella, 20, is now interesting at least two Premier League giants. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Premier League gossip and transfers on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Barella is under contract until 2021 but Roma have recently joined Juventus, AC Milan and Inter in watching him. 
Cagliari president Tommaso Giulini has, however, reportedly told Barella’s agent that the starlet will not be sold this summer. 
Such statements,though, are unlikely to deter clubs like Prem champions-elect Chelsea and their fourth-placed rivals Liverpool . 
The Blues have plenty of strength in midfield but manager Antonio Conte might feel he has little outstanding talent coming through in that department. 
And Klopp has tinkered around in mid-pitch as he tries to make up for workhorse Jordan Henderson’s injury problems.
